segment.source: How to Add or Upgrade Packages by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to Add or Upgrade Packages by Using the Management Console

segment.source: How to Add or Upgrade Packages by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to Add or Upgrade Packages by Using the Management Console

segment.source: How to Add or Upgrade Packages by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to Add or Upgrade Packages by Using the Management Console

segment.source: You can the following procedure to add or upgrade a package to the App-V 5.0 Management Console.
segment.target: You can the following procedure to add or upgrade a package to the App-V 5.0 Management Console.

segment.source: To upgrade a package that already exists in the Management Console, use the following steps and import the upgraded package using the same package Name.
segment.target: To upgrade a package that already exists in the Management Console, use the following steps and import the upgraded package using the same package Name.

segment.source: To add a package to the Management Console
segment.target: To add a package to the Management Console

segment.source: Click the Packages tab in the navigation pane of the Management Console display.
segment.target: Click the Packages tab in the navigation pane of the Management Console display.

segment.source: The console displays the list of packages that have been added to the server along with status information about each package.
segment.target: The console displays the list of packages that have been added to the server along with status information about each package.

segment.source: When a package is selected, detailed information about the package is displayed in the PACKAGES pane.
segment.target: When a package is selected, detailed information about the package is displayed in the PACKAGES pane.

segment.source: Click the Ungrouped drop-down list box and specify how the packages are to be displayed in the console.
segment.target: Click the Ungrouped drop-down list box and specify how the packages are to be displayed in the console.

segment.source: You can also click the associated column header to sort the packages.
segment.target: You can also click the associated column header to sort the packages.

segment.source: To specify the package you want to add, click Add or Upgrade Packages.
segment.target: To specify the package you want to add, click Add or Upgrade Packages.

segment.source: Type the full path to the package that you want to add.
segment.target: Type the full path to the package that you want to add.

segment.source: Use the UNC or HTTP path format, for example servernamesharenamefoldernamepackagename.appv or http://server.1234/file.appv, and then click Add.
segment.target: Use the UNC or HTTP path format, for example servernamesharenamefoldernamepackagename.appv or http://server.1234/file.appv, and then click Add.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: You must select a package with the .appv file name extension.
segment.target: You must select a package with the .appv file name extension.

segment.source: The page displays the status message Adding Packagename.
segment.target: The page displays the status message Adding Packagename.

segment.source: Click IMPORT STATUS to check the status of a package that you have imported.
segment.target: Click IMPORT STATUS to check the status of a package that you have imported.

segment.source: Click OK to add the package and close the Add Package page.
segment.target: Click OK to add the package and close the Add Package page.

segment.source: If there was an error during the import, click Detail on the Package Import page for more information.
segment.target: If there was an error during the import, click Detail on the Package Import page for more information.

segment.source: The newly added package is now available in the PACKAGES pane.
segment.target: The newly added package is now available in the PACKAGES pane.

segment.source: Click Close to close the Add or Upgrade Packages page.
segment.target: Click Close to close the Add or Upgrade Packages page.

segment.source: Got a suggestion for App-V?
segment.target: Got a suggestion for App-V?

segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.
